ca.ualberta.lard.model

Class Follow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.lard.model.Follow

  • public class Follow
extends java.lang.Object
    The object that manages the users that we are following. Like favourites, it requires a SharedPreference in order to function.
    Author:
    Troy Pavlek
